content: I still have a ton to learn and I really am looking forward to now having the time to spend much more time with all the teams on what they're doing and really tie the efforts of the business to those four key drivers of revenue because I believe if we can focus ourselves on each of those, and make sure we're aligning resources in the proper way with the overlay of growing sales-assisted more than self-serve, I think we can really produce some terrific results for the company.
